name: shortcut command on Desktop

screenshots.caption: Run the program and try typing in these words and press enter, the IE should be opened.

short_description:
SET UP:
1. at the "C:\" folder create a txt file named "ShortCuts.txt"
2. put in the matched pattern you want.
(two lines, line 1 is the command, line 2 is the program's FULL PATH.
eg:
line1: ie
line2: "C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe"
)
3. run the program.
4.(maybe) clear your desktop and change all  icons into patterns in the txt file.
TIP: everytime you change the txt file, a restart will be needed to reload the file. To restart program, just kill the process and run it again.

USE:Press the semicolon key, then enter the command name you specified, finally press enter, and the program will be start up!

PS:This program uses the LOW LEVEL KEYBOARD HOOK, so maybe some anti-virus program will warn you about it(:.
summary: an easier way to start a windows application
